title: x-ased-cyber-observable-core
description: Common properties and behavior across all ASED Cyber Observable Objects.

date.description: Specifies the date/time that the message was sent.

x_ased_message_id.description: Reference to the uuid field of the metadata of the incoming message json in kafka

x_ased_malicious.description: Classification of whether the message is from a friend or foe

x_ased_motive.description: List of one or more possible motives for an attacker

x_ased_eval_partner.description: The evaluation partner that the volunteer belongs to. This piece of information can be found in the kafka metadata in the field "eval_partner".
